module.name: scdb
module.description: Populates a SQL database from XML files or messages.

parameter.name: requestGroup
parameter.description: Defines the group on scmaster to subscribe for database requests.

parameter.name: provideGroup
parameter.description: Defines the group on scmaster to send database response messages to.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Defines the output database connection type.

parameter.name: parameters
parameter.description: Defines the output database connection parameters.

option.description: scdb can either process a XML file and write it to the database or collecting messages from scmaster. If connected to scmaster the mode defines what objects are handled: none (no objects at all), notifier (notifier only) or all (all objects whereas non-notifier objects are INSERTED into the database).

If connected to scmaster this flag defines the database connection to use for writing. The configured application database connection (as received from scmaster) is reported to clients as part of a database response messages.
Defines the import XML file to be written to database. Can be provided multiple times to import multiple files.
Batch size of a database transactions [0..1000]. By default all INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE statements are executed in one single transaction.
